constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Washington:
H.R. 4490.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1, which ``provides Congress
with the power to lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and
Excises'' in order to ``provide for the . . . general Welfare
of the United States.''
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Emergency Economic and Workforce System Resiliency Act
